en.common-description: You can preview the different effects of style properties through the theme controller
en.common-theme: Theme mode, preferentially inherited from the parent.
en.common-color: Control color, preferentially inherited from the parent.

zh-CN.common-description: 可通过文档页面中的主题控制器，预览样式属性的不同效果
zh-CN.common-theme: 主题模式，优先从父级继承。
zh-CN.common-color: 控件颜色，优先从父级继承。
